speak;Emma; Hey, Sarah, do you know how much longer it'll be until we hit land?{w} I fear for my sister's health if we're at sea for too long.
speak;Sarah; Hm{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I think we're anywhere between{tgm}...{tgm}{w} three to fifteen days from land.
speak;Emma;...;no_talk
speak;Emma; Um, Sarah{tgm}...{tgm} That's a huge gap in time.
speak;Sarah; Er, well, admittedly, I'm not a great seafarer at all.{w} Maybe you could ask someone below deck, but I wouldn't know.
speak;Emma; How do you even know we're heading towards our destination, then?
speak;Sarah;...;no_talk
speak;Sarah; Emma, I'd appreciate it if you didn't waver my faith so much.
speak;Emma;Sorry{tgm}...
speak;Sarah; *Sigh* It's alright, I'm used to not feeling like the leader I need to be{tgm}...
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma; How could you say that?!{w} If it weren't for you, we wouldn't all be together!
speak;Sarah; Pft, Emma, have you seriously not realized it yet?
speak;Emma; Huh? Realize what?

speak;Sarah; Emma, we're here because <bconvo>you</> came along.{w} Your ability to make allies, diffuse situations, issue commands{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Emma, you're already a better leader for The Defiants,{w} and you're only an acquaintance to some of these people.{w} Some people are just born leaders.
speak;Emma; But{tgm}...{tgm} I don't want to lead!
speak;Sarah; Most who are fit to lead don't want to.
speak;Emma; You're every bit the leader I am!{w} If you'd stop doubting yourself,{w} then maybe you'd get the confidence to lead everyone competently.
speak;Sarah;...;no_talk
speak;Emma;...;no_talk
speak;Emma;Sarah{tgm}...{tgm} I'm sorry, that wasn't-
speak;Sarah; No, no, don't apologize for truths.{w} Thank you, Emma.{w} Once again, you prove that I was right to ask you to be my right hand woman.
